Container.Name: SurfSense - Worker
Container.Overview: Open Source Alternative to NotebookLM / Perplexity / Glean, connected to external sources such as search engines (Tavily, Linkup), Slack, Linear, Notion, YouTube, GitHub, Discord and more. [br] This is the worker container.
Container.Category: AI: MediaApp:Other Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: notebooklm llm erplexity glean ai search engine slack linear notion youtube github discord podcast notes text corpus
Container.Requires: Requires separate SurfSense - Frontend, SurfSense - Worker, pgAdmin4, pgvector and Redis containers. See documentation: https://github.com/MODSetter/SurfSense/blob/main/DOCKER_SETUP.md#deployment-options

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8000

Config.Name: Database - URL
Config.Description: URL of the PostgreSQL database, including port and credentials

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: JWT Secret key for authentication (should be a secure random string)

Config.Name: Frontend URL
Config.Description: URL of the frontend service, including port

Config.Name: Authentication - Type
Config.Description: Authentication type (Google OAuth or local email/password)

Config.Name: Authentication - Google Client ID
Config.Description: Google OAuth Client ID. Required if AUTH_TYPE is set to GOOGLE.

Config.Name: Authentication - Google Client Secret
Config.Description: Google OAuth Client Secret. Required if AUTH_TYPE is set to GOOGLE.

Config.Name: Google - Calendar Redirect URI
Config.Description: Redirect URI for Google Calendar OAuth. Must match the one set in Google Cloud Console.

Config.Name: Google - Gmail Redirect URI
Config.Description: Redirect URI for Google Gmail OAuth. Must match the one set in Google Cloud Console.

Config.Name: AirTable - Client ID
Config.Description: AirTable OAuth Client ID. Required if using AirTable connector.

Config.Name: AirTable - Client Secret
Config.Description: AirTable OAuth Client Secret. Required if using AirTable connector.

Config.Name: AirTable - Redirect URI
Config.Description: Redirect URI for AirTable OAuth. Must match the one set in AirTable developer console.

Config.Name: Models - Embedder Model
Config.Description: Name of the embedding model (e.g., openai://text-embedding-ada-002, anthropic://claude-v1, mixedbread-ai/mxbai-embed-large-v1)

Config.Name: Models - Reranker Model
Config.Description: Name of the reranker model (e.g., ms-marco-MiniLM-L-12-v2)

Config.Name: Models - Reranker Model Type
Config.Description: Type of reranker model (e.g., flashrank)

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Text To Speech Service
Config.Description: Text-to-Speech API provider for Podcasts (e.g., openai/tts-1, azure/neural, vertex_ai/). See documentation: https://docs.litellm.ai/docs/text_to_speech#supported-providers

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Text To Speech API Base
Config.Description: Base URL for the Text To Speech API. Optional, leave empty to use default.

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Text To Speech API Key
Config.Description: API Key for the Text To Speech API provider. Required if the provider needs authentication.

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Speech To Text Service
Config.Description: Speech-to-Text API provider for Podcasts (e.g., openai/whisper-1, local). See documentation: https://docs.litellm.ai/docs/audio_transcription#supported-providers

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Speech To Text Local Model
Config.Description: Local Whisper model size to use if STT_SERVICE is set to local.

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Speech To Text API Base
Config.Description: Base URL for the Speech To Text API. Optional, leave empty to use default.

Config.Name: LiteLLM - Speech To Text API Key
Config.Description: API Key for the Speech To Text API provider. Required if the provider needs authentication.

Config.Name: Firecrawl - API Key
Config.Description: API key for Firecrawl service for web crawling

Config.Name: ETL Service
Config.Description: Document parsing service

Config.Name: Unstructured - API Key
Config.Description: API key for Unstructured.io service for document parsing. Required if ETL Service is set to UNSTRUCTURED

Config.Name: LlamaCloud - API Key
Config.Description: API key for LlamaCloud service for document parsing. Required if ETL Service is set to LLAMACLOUD

Config.Name: Redis - URL
Config.Description: URL of the Redis instance used as Celery broker, including port

Config.Name: Redis - Results URL
Config.Description: URL of the Redis instance used as Celery result backend, including port. Must match CELERY_BROKER_URL

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Path to store app data. Must match Backend

Config.Name: Temp Data
Config.Description: Path to store temporary data. Must be shared between containers.

Config.Name: LangSmith - Tracing
Config.Description: Enable LangSmith tracing.

Config.Name: LangSmith - Endpoint
Config.Description: LangSmith API endpoint. Default is https://api.smith.langchain.com, change only if you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: LangSmith - Project Name
Config.Description: LangSmith project name.

Config.Name: LangSmith - API Key
Config.Description: API key for LangSmith tracing. Required if LANGSMITH_TRACING is enabled.

Config.Name: Uvicorn - Host
Config.Description: Uvicorn host address. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Uvicorn - Port
Config.Description: Uvicorn port. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Uvicorn - Log Level
Config.Description: Uvicorn log level. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Python Path
Config.Description: Internal Python path for the application. Not recommended to change.
